title: You have two more days to score a Sam’s Club membership for $20
content:
Macworld

Ready to go a little easier on your wallet? At Sam’s Club, members can save money on nearly everything — from food to furniture to jewelry and even prescriptions. And for two more days, you can even save on your membership and score it for just $20. This 1-year membership is $30 off the usual price now through May 12.

Your budget will love these savings

Once you join, you can stretch your dollar even further as you get access to budget-friendly options for everyday essentials. Grab your weekly groceries, stock up on paper towels and toilet paper, and then head to the pharmacy to pick up a prescription.

Sam’s Club members can also save on hotel bookings, car rentals, live events, movies, and more. Your membership also comes with some peace of mind, as you can rest easy knowing Sam’s Club has committed to sustainability via bulk packaging, eco-friendly products, and energy-efficient operations.

This deal is available to new Sam’s Club members or former members whose membership expired six months ago or more. Purchase automatically enrolls you in auto-renewal.

Secure a year of savings with this 1-year Sam’s Club membership for $20 (reg. $50) through May 12. Or opt for the 1-year Sam’s Club Plus Membership for $60 and even more perks.
